page.title: 08RECREATION AND LEISURE
page.content: {THE PEOPLE OF UPPER SUNDON} The people of Upper Sundon, a small village just outside Luton,were surveyed to find out what they did in their spare time and to act as a comparison with the urban areas already mentioned.The main pursuits were gardening and leisure activities centred upon public houses. This could be explained by the lack of facilities for both outdoor and indoor sports. We thought that this would encourage them to watch a lot of television.However, the average viewing time per person was only 3 hours 20 minutes per day, watching mainly news programmes. The people surveyed predominantly in the upper age group and more likely to spend their leisure time on pursuits which were not reliant on television. Other sports mentioned were swimming and football taking place nearby.
